content:
state HornetOctober  

The mens soccer team improved to  in Mountain Pacific Sports Federation play with a victory over Air Force on Sunday PERIOD The victory over Air Force comes on the heels of a  tie against the Denver Pioneers on Friday PERIOD

During Fridays game Blake Nunes scored the lone Hornet goal in the ninetieth minute of play on an assist from Fernando Cabadas PERIOD The game went into double overtime but neither squad could score the golden goal PERIOD

The Pioneers outshot the Hornets  for the contest as well as  in shots on goal and  in sudden death overtime PERIOD Hornet goalie Ryan Kenny provided eight saves PERIOD

Sunday the Hornets continued their Colorado road trip and faced off against Air Force PERIOD Despite a twohour snow delay and being forced to play the game on artificial turf the mens team pulled out a  victory PERIOD

Cabadas and Emmanuel Ochoa contributed a goal each to the Hornet victory PERIOD

Nunes did not play in Sundays game because he was serving a onegame suspension for receiving two yellow cards in Fridays game PERIOD

The Hornets next game will be Nov PERIOD  at Hornet Field against Denver PERIOD

The State Hornet Staff can be reached at emailprotected

Your donation will support the student journalists of Sacramento State University PERIOD Your contribution will allow us to purchase equipment and cover our annual website hosting costs PERIOD
